_header: O vanity of vanities and all is vanity
Subjects: Fortune, Wheel of; vanity, against worldly

BodAsh61.First Lines:
O vanyte off vanites & All is vaniteLo how þis werld is
                    turnyd vp & downeNow wele now wo now tranquilyteNow werre now pese
                    & now rebilyoun…
BodAsh61.Last Lines:
…Bot labour in pouerte to þe tyme þat we
                    dyȝeȝit is not labour not bot vanyt
BodAsh61.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 238-40.
Shuffleton,  George. 
             Ashmole 61: A Compilation of Popular Middle English Verse.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008: 399-401; 587-901; 627.
